tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: During WWI, U.S. diplomats serving in Europe helped 100,000+ U.S. citizens escape the fighting and return home, facilitatedâ€¦
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: During WWI, U.S. diplomats serving in Europe helped 100,000+ U.S. citizens escape the fighting and return home, facilitated the development and operation of hospitals, and mitigated disputes for prisoners of war. Learn about #HeroesofUSDiplomacy here: go.usa.gov/xp3FN.
